name: Forgotten, Us
description:
You are a group of people that have been “hibernating” for centuries. You chose stasis because of your own reasons, such as to cure an illness that couldn’t be cured at your time, or to accomplish a secret task in the future. Time passed by, but you could not feel it while you hibernated in the life machine.

You wake up to a world in ruins, seeing no other human beings except for the several hibernators in front of you with the same confused looks on their faces. Where is everyone? What happened to humanity? The story unfolds as you step your shaky feet on the ground.

Forgotten, Us is a one page survival roleplaying game with a focus on learning to live in a no longer recognizable landscape.
